item.title: 股市多头或将疲软就业数据视为美联储降息的契机
item.description:
策略师吉姆·保罗森表示，历史表明，疲软的就业增长通常会推动股市上涨。

【原文：

History shows that anemic jobs growth typically leads to stock gains, strategist Jim Paulsen says.

】

item.title: 普拉博沃将签署美印贸易协议，出席和平委员会会议
item.description: 印度尼西亚领导人普拉博沃·苏比安托预计将于下周飞赴华盛顿，出席唐纳德·特朗普总统主持的和平委员会首次会议，届时他将签署备受期待的美国关税协议。【原文：Indonesian leader Prabowo Subianto is expected to sign a much-awaited US tariff agreement when he flies to Washington next week to attend President Donald Trump’s inaugural meeting of the Board of Peace.】

item.title: 白银历史性暴涨引发变卖传家宝与硬币热潮
item.description:
过去一年间，价格已翻倍有余，即便近期市场出现回调亦是如此。

【原文：

Prices have more than doubled over the past year, even after the recent market pullback.

】

item.title: 纳米比亚需要更多资金来应对牲畜口蹄疫疫情
item.description: 纳米比亚估计，为保护其畜牧业免受口蹄疫疫情影响所需资金远超已拨备金额。该疫情正肆虐邻国南非的偶蹄类动物。【原文：Namibia estimates it needs far more money than it has already set aside to shield its livestock industry from an outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease that has plagued cloven-hoofed animals in neighboring South Africa.】

item.title: 印度SBI银行市值超越科技巨头TCS，时隔15年再登顶
item.description: 印度国家银行——印度最大的国有银行——时隔15年后，其市值首次超越该国顶级科技企业，这表明投资者更青睐那些与国内经济增长紧密相关的企业。【原文：State Bank of India — India’s largest state-backed lender — saw its market value surpass that of the country’s top technology firm after a gap of 15 years, signaling investor preference for companies tied closely to domestic economic growth.】

item.title: 安瓦尔敦促暂停职务并调查马来西亚反贪污专员
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔·易卜拉欣曾以整顿政府为承诺上台执政，如今却面临要求其暂停该国反贪污专员职务并调查其在某金融服务公司持股的呼声。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim, who rose to power on a pledge to clean up government, is facing calls to suspend the country’s anti-graft chief and investigate his shareholding in a financial-services company.】

item.title: 英国企业追逐英镑债券需求，此前谷歌母公司Alphabet达成巨额债券交易
item.description: 在谷歌母公司Alphabet公司创纪录的债券发行之后，英国债券市场展现出其深度，三家英国公司于周三成功发行新债。【原文：The sterling bond market is showing its depth after the bumper Alphabet Inc sale, with three UK firms raising new debt on Wednesday.】

item.title: 疲软就业数据或成推高股市的潜在催化剂
item.description: 在华尔街等待这份可能影响重大的美国就业报告之际，部分投资者正押注经济坏消息将转化为股市利好。【原文：As Wall Street awaits a potentially consequential US employment report, some investors are counting on bad news for the economy turning into good news for stocks.】

item.title: 软银支持的Icertis据称正与高盛合作推进潜在50亿美元出售交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，Icertis公司正考虑出售事宜，这家由软银集团支持的科技公司估值可能高达50亿美元。【原文：Icertis Inc. is considering a sale that may value the SoftBank Group Corp.-backed tech company at as much as $5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通区块链部门联席主管马莱拉离职
item.description: 摩根大通公司区块链部门的全球联席主管在该行任职逾十年后离职，此时正值该行加速拓展数字资产支付业务之际。【原文：The global co-head of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s blockchain division has left after more than a decade at the bank, as it steps up an expansion in digital-asset payments.】

item.title: 肯尼亚迎来欧元债券发行"理想窗口"，发行成本持续走低
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部长约翰·姆巴迪表示，借贷成本的下降为该国再次发行欧元债券创造了"理想"条件。【原文：A fall in borrowing costs have made conditions ‘ideal’ for another Kenyan eurobond issuance, according to the nation’s Treasury Secretary John Mbadi.】

item.title: 德国天然气补给季前景严峻，市场经理称
item.description: 德国市场监管机构表示，该国天然气储存运营商今夏将面临"艰难"的储气季，因为重新填充这些大型储气设施已无利可图。【原文：Germany’s gas storage operators are set to face a “difficult” stockpiling season this summer as it’s unprofitable to refill the vast sites, according to the country’s market manager.】

item.title: 建筑热潮吸引数千古巴人涌入石油资源丰富的圭亚那
item.description: 圭亚那作为一个快速发展的石油国家，建设计划众多却面临劳动力短缺。因此，当地修建道路、桥梁及其他基础设施的企业正将目光投向古巴移民，将其作为新的劳动力来源。【原文：Guyana, a fast-growing petrostate, is ripe with construction plans but short on workers. So the companies building roads, bridges and other infrastructure there are turning to Cuban migrants as a new source of labor.】

item.title: 玻利维亚寻求高达33亿美元的国际货币基金组织融资
item.description: 玻利维亚正与国际货币基金组织就一项可能提供高达33亿美元融资的计划进行磋商。总统罗德里戈·帕斯的新政府正致力于带领这个安第斯国家走出四十年来的最严重经济危机。【原文：Bolivia is in talks with the International Monetary Fund over a program that could provide as much as $3.3 billion in financing, as the new administration of President Rodrigo Paz seeks to pull the Andean nation out of its deepest economic crisis in four decades.】

item.title: 摩根大通研究发现：地缘政治与人工智能将推动2026年市场波动加剧
item.description: 摩根大通公司的一项调查显示，未来一年全球强国之间的冲突将加剧市场波动，而人工智能的发展也成为交易员最关注的焦点。【原文：Clashes between global powers will fuel further market swings over the coming year, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. survey, with developments in artificial intelligence also top of traders’ minds.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预计今年将再获得两艘破冰级液化天然气运输船
item.description: 俄罗斯受制裁的北极液化天然气2号项目预计将于2026年再接收两艘国产破冰级液化天然气运输船，这将进一步释放该项目的出口潜力。【原文：Russia’s sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 plant is expected to receive two more domestically constructed ice-class liquefied natural gas carriers in 2026, further unlocking the project’s export potential.】

item.title: 杰瑞希迈尔股价暴跌35%，年度业绩推迟公布
item.description: 德国医药和化妆品包装制造商Gerresheimer AG因推迟发布年度业绩，其股价暴跌至16年多来的最低点。【原文：Gerresheimer AG shares plunged to the lowest in more than 16 years after the German maker of packaging for medicines and cosmetics delayed the publication of its annual results.】

item.title: 中国智普发布新AI模型，与DeepSeek展开激烈竞争
item.description: 中国人工智能开发商智普即将发布其旗舰模型的升级版，此举将加速抢占市场先机的竞争，以应对DeepSeek公司预期将推出的新产品。【原文：Chinese AI developer Zhipu is set to release an upgrade of its flagship model, accelerating a race to preempt an expected new product from DeepSeek.】

item.title: 赌场债权人提议接管陷入困境的连锁超市
item.description: 向吉夏尔-佩拉雄超市集团提供贷款的债权人已准备好接管这家陷入困境的法国连锁超市，并实施他们自行设计的接管方案。【原文：Lenders to Casino Guichard-Perrachon SA are ready to take over the beleaguered French supermarket chain in a plan of their own design.】

item.title: 美国国债持稳，交易员静候延迟发布的美国就业数据
item.description: 美国国债价格基本持平，因市场等待推迟发布的1月就业报告，该报告可能助长市场对今年进一步降息的预期。【原文：US Treasuries were little changed ahead of January’s delayed employment report, which may fan expectations of deeper interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 瑞士将于六月就1000万人口上限提案进行投票
item.description: 瑞士选民将于六月决定，1000万人是否已是该国所能承受的极限。【原文：Swiss voters will get to decide in June whether 10 million people is all the country can bear.】

item.title: 德国商业银行的奥尔洛普敦促欧盟在放松管制方面跟上美国步伐
item.description: 德国商业银行首席执行官贝蒂娜·奥洛普表示，当前欧洲为减轻银行监管负担提出的方案力度不足。在欧盟领导人即将召开会议讨论该议题的前一天，这番言论为关于欧盟竞争力下滑的讨论增添了紧迫感。【原文：Commerzbank AG Chief Executive Officer Bettina Orlopp said current European proposals for reducing the regulatory burden on banks don’t go far enough, adding urgency to the debate about the bloc’s declining competitiveness one day before its leaders will meet to discuss the topic.】

item.title: 据称沙特FII活动组织者阿提亚斯正为IPO挑选银行
item.description: 理查德·阿蒂亚斯及合伙人公司——这家每年吸引华尔街巨头齐聚利雅得的沙特未来投资倡议峰会主办方——已选定多家银行参与其计划中的首次公开募股。【原文：Richard Attias & Associates, the organizer of Saudi Arabia’s Future Investment Initiative summit that attracts Wall Street titans to Riyadh every year, has tapped a roster of banks to work on its planned initial public offering.】

item.title: 赞比亚央行降息，预计通胀将缓解
item.description: 赞比亚央行连续第二次会议下调基准利率，因其预计通胀将进一步缓解。【原文：Zambia’s central bank lowered its key interest rate for a second straight meeting as it projected a further easing in inflation.】

item.title: 印度要求炼油商考虑增加购买美国和委内瑞拉原油
item.description: 印度要求国有炼油商考虑增加购买美国和委内瑞拉原油，此前特朗普政府宣布的贸易协议包含停止进口俄罗斯原油的承诺。【原文：India asked state-owned refiners to consider buying more US and Venezuelan crude after a trade deal the Trump administration said included a pledge to stop importing Russian barrels.】

item.title: 陷入困境的巴黎写字楼即将低价出售
item.description: 巴黎金融区的一系列写字楼正被贷款机构接管或准备以低价出售，该地区正面临空置率飙升和估值暴跌的困境。【原文：A series of office towers in Paris’s financial district are being taken over by lenders or are set for cut-price sales as the area grapples with a soaring vacancy rate and collapsing valuations.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称欧元区下半年工资增长将加速
item.description: 欧元区薪资增长将在下半年加速，这支持了欧洲央行的观点，即利率可以保持稳定。【原文：Euro-area pay growth is set to quicken in the second half of the year, supporting the European Central Bank’s view that interest rates can remain steady.】

item.title: 先见资本加大SRT购买力度以吸引私募信贷投资者
item.description: 对冲基金先见资本管理公司正加大购买重大风险转移产品的力度，试图吸引那些仍希望接触贷款但对私募信贷市场暴跌持谨慎态度的投资者。【原文：Hedge fund Seer Capital Management LP is stepping up purchases of significant risk transfers in a bid to lure investors who still want exposure to loans but are wary of the rout in private credit.】

item.title: 爱泼斯坦聘请盖茨前公关顾问及派生广场公关专家重塑形象
item.description: 根据美国司法部公布的材料，在杰弗里·爱泼斯坦于2019年因联邦性交易指控被捕前四个月，他曾将一位名叫约翰·皮内特的资深科技通信高管接至其位于佛罗里达州棕榈滩的住所。【原文：Four months before Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on federal sex trafficking charges in 2019, he flew a veteran tech communications executive named John Pinette to his home in Palm Beach, Florida, according to materials released by the US Department of Justice.】

item.title: 刚果铜出口去年增长10%，中国推动产量攀升
item.description: 刚果民主共和国去年铜出口量增长近10%，巩固了其作为全球第二大工业金属生产国的地位，仅次于智利。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo increased its copper exports by almost 10% last year, cementing its status as the world’s second-largest producer of the industrial metal after Chile.】
